thread.title: Pawan Kalyan rejects Chiru’s invite
thread.title_full: Pawan Kalyan rejects Chiru’s invite - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pawan Kalyan rejects Chiru’s invite
text:
Mega Power Star Ram Charan's upcoming action entertainer Bruce Lee's audio launch event will kick start in some time in Hyderabad and a lot of Tollywood bigwigs will be gracing the event. And Mega Star Chiranjeevi is going to be core attraction at the event. And if speculations are to be believed, Power Star Pawan Kalyan was also invited for the function; nonetheless he rejected the 'mega invitation'. In fact, it is said that PK isn't interested in coming out at public events and will also skip Chiranjeevi's 60th birthday function.
In fact, as per the buzz, when Pawan Kalyan was formally invited for the audio launch ceremony of Bruce Lee, he simply said no. No big surprise indeed!
